practiceAreas.title: Practice Areas
practiceAreas.subtitle: Our expertise spans across key areas of business and corporate law

corporateLaw.title: Corporate Law
corporateLaw.description: Comprehensive legal solutions for businesses, including company formation, corporate governance, and regulatory compliance.
corporateLaw.longDescription: Our corporate law practice provides comprehensive legal services to businesses of all sizes. We assist with company formation, corporate restructuring, mergers and acquisitions, joint ventures, and corporate governance. Our team has extensive experience in drafting and negotiating commercial contracts, shareholder agreements, and ensuring regulatory compliance.

businessLaw.title: Business Law
businessLaw.description: Expert guidance in commercial transactions, contracts, and business operations across jurisdictions.
businessLaw.longDescription: Our business law practice offers strategic legal solutions to help businesses thrive in today's complex market environment. We provide comprehensive advice on contract law, commercial transactions, business structuring, and risk management. Our expertise extends to regulatory compliance, business licensing, and dispute resolution.

litigation.title: Litigation
litigation.description: Strategic representation in civil and commercial disputes, with a focus on achieving optimal outcomes.
litigation.longDescription: Our litigation practice represents clients in complex civil and commercial disputes across multiple jurisdictions. We handle cases involving contract disputes, shareholder conflicts, employment issues, and intellectual property rights. Our team excels in both traditional litigation and alternative dispute resolution methods.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: Protection and management of intellectual property rights, including patents, trademarks, and copyrights.
intellectualProperty.longDescription: Our intellectual property practice helps clients protect and monetize their valuable IP assets. We handle all aspects of IP law, including patent applications, trademark registration, copyright protection, and trade secret management. Our services cover IP portfolio management, licensing agreements, and technology transfers.

attorneys.title: Our Attorneys
attorneys.subtitle: Meet our team of experienced legal professionals

mucyo.bio: Donatien Mucyo is the Managing Partner at PMG Advocates, with extensive experience in corporate and business law. He has successfully advised numerous multinational corporations on their operations in Rwanda and the East African region.

gisagara.bio: Richard Gisagara is a Senior Partner based in our Paris office, specializing in international litigation and corporate law. With over 15 years of experience, he has represented clients in complex cross-border disputes and transactions.

paruelle.bio: Gilles Paruelle is a Senior Partner in our Paris office, focusing on international business law and tax advisory. His expertise in French and European business law has been instrumental in serving our international clientele.
